definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: It includes strategies and skills. The self-regulation theory emphasizes children's activation and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 自我調控理論強調兒童的能動性和靈活性。

sentences.english: Must adopting the measure of ecological control affectively.
sentences.chinese: 必須採取措施進行有效地治理與生態調控。

sentences.english: We should tighten regulation of the real estate market and strengthen construction of government-subsidized housing.
sentences.chinese: 加強房地產市場調控和保障性安居工程建設。

sentences.english: We strengthened regulation and oversight of thereal estatemarket to improve the mix of market housing available.
sentences.chinese: 加強房地產市場調控和監管，着力調整住房供給結構。

sentences.english: The optimum adjustment of the human-natural relationship should be implemented into specific regions.
sentences.chinese: 人地關係優化調控必須落實到具體的區域。

sentences.english: Wages in China are regulated by local governments and are often quite low.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，工資收入是由地方政府調控的而且通常很低。

sentences.english: But this time, the advent of macro-control.
sentences.chinese: 但是這一次，出現的宏觀調控。

sentences.english: CO(constans) was an important gene involved in the photoperiod pathway controlling plant flowering time.
sentences.chinese: 是植物開花時間光週期調控途徑中的一個重要基因。

sentences.english: Consequently, the molecular mediators regulating the secretion of salt and fluid in the gut do not get fully activated.
sentences.chinese: 結果，調控腸道水鹽分泌的調節分子未獲得充分活化。

sentences.english: And the macro-control measures need time to take effect.
sentences.chinese: 政府宏觀調控的作用一段時間之後才能顯現出來。

sentences.english: Established that proto-oncogenes play important roles in normal cellular control.
sentences.chinese: 確立原癌基因在正常細胞調控中的重要作用。

sentences.english: The results supported viewpoint that honeybee sex ratio was determined by workers.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果支持了工蜂調控蜜蜂性比的觀點。

sentences.english: Conclusion This study suggested that endocrine factors may influence and regulate the repair and resorption of alveolar bone.
sentences.chinese: 結論證實牙槽骨修復確受全身內分泌因素調控。

sentences.english: You can adjust the range of frequencies available to this governor.
sentences.chinese: 您可以調整此調控器可用的頻率範圍。

sentences.english: The exogenous gene ALB was highly expressed in the regulating sequence.
sentences.chinese: 位於該調控序列內的ALB高效表達。

sentences.english: Progesterone is a hormone with different actions dependent on the period in the oestrous cycle.
sentences.chinese: 黃體酮爲孕激素，在動物發情週期中起調控作用。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
(economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
